summary: Social media app with video posting, live streaming, and messaging features

existing_features.title: Add ability to create and post video content with captions and author selection (user or character)
Implement live streaming capability for the user and their character friends to broadcast live video
Fix the messaging functionality so conversations and message sending work reliably

new_feature_requests.summary: Add live streaming functionality for user and character friends
Fix messaging feature that isn't working properly
